text:
It was our first time visiting Fun Toast at HomeTeamNS Bedok Reservoir, and it turned out to be a really pleasant experience. We decided to grab a quick bite before heading into Action Motion for some fun activities.

I tried the lou mai kai and was pleasantly surprised by how tasty it was — flavorful and satisfying, especially when paired with my kopi-o peng. The combination was simple yet comforting.

The place was a little crowded when we arrived, but service remained fast and efficient, which we appreciated. The surrounding environment also added to the experience — it was relaxing and made for a nice spot to unwind before our activity.

Overall, a great pitstop for a quick and tasty meal. Would definitely come back again.

Such an amazing outlet for dating/family/alone time.
Came on a Saturday about 2pm, no crowd, no queue.

Ordering was seamless.
Toast was amazing.
Half Boiled Egg was marvellous.

Just what one would need on a Saturday.

Food: 5/5
Service: 5/5
Atmosphere: 5/5

Will definitely come again!

5/12/2024
Had honey lime sour plum drink ($3.60), was quite good. Spacious dining area, aircon was adequate too.
Perfect location overlooking reservoir. Fully air conditioned provided nice cool air but at the same time trapped kitchen fume & greasy smell in the entire room… not that enjoyable.

Surprisingly the Kopi was nicer than other outlet, food was also good. Hope they can maintain the standard. The service was fast and staff are friendly. Environment was very cozy, good place to chill out. But the collection system need to be improved. The drinks was collected immediately after purchase but may need to advise the customer to Q for drink first.
